item.description:
EVENT : Come Boogie Tonight as we attend a free Hatch Shell concert with KC and the Sunshine Band, The Band have been around since the mid-70s and their style has included Funk, R&B, Disco, they are best known for such hits as "Get Down Tonight", "That’s the Way I like It’’, and "(Shake,Shake,Shake) Shake Your Booty".

Events Leader is Heather and when you rsvp contact can be made

MEET : We will meet at the bottom of the Arthur Fiedler footbridge at 6:30 p.m. Participants can meet earlier if you provide the time and a cell number in your rsvp. Heather plans to arrive at 5 p.m., and will bring games to play while waiting for the concert to begin.
RSVP : Required.
COST : Free for members, $5 if you are a guest or not a full member.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and we can make the arrangements

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Enjoy a R&B's concert along the Esplande
